name: In Search of Evidence
description:
In Search of Evidence is a game developed during the Abertay Serious Game Jam, in February 2016. The purpose of the game jam was to develop an interactive way to help teach first-responders to a crime scene about how to handle technological devices correctly.

The game is styled in 3D isometric, with the player taking indirectly control of a squad of first-responders. The player can pan around the scene and give instructions to the squad regarding finding and collecting relevant evidence.

Developed by The Doomsday Bunnies:

Programming
Stuart McEwan
Dean Sinclair

Art/Game Design
Craig Alexander
